issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Go to Kitchen sink, Button, tap the 'click me' green button.

Compare tapping on the area taken by the label to the area of the button not covered by the label. They both fire 'click' events, but the button and label do not appear to hilight when tapping the label.
fields.summary: iOS: non-listened Label added to button suppresses touchdown button taps in the label's area
fields.environment: iPad 2, iOS 4.3(8F191), using iPhone idiom. Titanium hash 8cb7c3

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
